column4: Hi, I dont understand the site structure of ubuntu.com. I often can find pages only with google. For example https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RadeonHD found with the words "ubuntu radeonhd howto" But I cant find it when starting one level above https://help.ubuntu.com/community
That's because it's a wiki, not a directory as such.
I never said that. I don't like how the wiki is, but screaming about it isn't going to fix anything.
You're also more than welcome to write pages and make it all easier to navigate, if you wish.
